trans-unit.source: @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ login Email Verification
trans-unit.target: 红帽登录电子邮件验证

trans-unit.source: @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ login Email Verification
trans-unit.target: 红帽登录电子邮件验证

trans-unit.source: Your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Account is ready
trans-unit.target: 您的 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 帐号已经准备好

trans-unit.source: @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ User Created: {0} ({1}, {2} <{3}>)
trans-unit.target: @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 用户创建的：{0}（{1}, {2}, {3}）

trans-unit.source: @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Account Deactivated: {0}
trans-unit.target: @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 帐号被取消激活：{0}

trans-unit.source:
The Red Hat login {0} has been deactivated in response to your request.
Thank you for contacting Red Hat.
trans-unit.target:
红帽登录 {0} 已经根据您的要求被取消激活。
非常感谢您联系红帽。

trans-unit.source: Red Hat login creation request
trans-unit.target: 红帽登录创建请求

trans-unit.source: For additional information in German language, please visit our Website: {0}
trans-unit.target: 如需更多关于德语的信息，请访问我们的网站： {0}

trans-unit.source: For French, click here: {0}
trans-unit.target: 法语请点这里：{0}

trans-unit.source:
Dear Red Hat Customer,
You were recently named on an order for new Red Hat subscriptions. These subscriptions are now available in the following account:
Customer Name : {0} Account Number: {1}
You can click on the link below to create a new Red Hat Login for this account and obtain access to your subscriptions:
{2}
If you are not the technical manager who will utilize the Red Hat subscription services purchased, please forward this email to the appropriate user within your organization. If they do not already have a Red Hat Login, that user may follow the link above to establish a new one.
If you already have a login and it is linked to the above account, then no action is required. You can find the account number linked to an existing Red Hat Login by logging into the following page:
http://www.redhat.com/support/
If you already have a Red Hat Login that is linked to a different account than the one listed on this email, and would like to use that account to manage these subscriptions, Red Hat can transfer them to your desired account. Please contact your regional Red Hat Customer Service Representative, using the contact information provided at the following link:
{3}
Note to the Account Administrator (Organization Administrator): Before a new user can access subscriptions, you must grant them the ability to see and manage the subscriptions on your account. This requires that a User Administration entitlement exist on your account. If required, please follow the link above and contact your regional Red Hat Customer Service Representative to request this feature.
Thank you for choosing Red Hat.
Sincerely, Red Hat Account Management Team
trans-unit.target:
尊敬的红帽用户：
您当前购买了新的红帽订阅。这些 订阅已经在以下帐号中有效：
用户名：{0} 帐号名：{1}
您可以通过点下面的链接来为这个帐号创建一个新的红帽登录 并获得访问您的订阅的权利：
{2}
如果您并不是负责管理您所购买的红帽订阅服务的技术负责人， 请把这个电子邮件转发给您机构中相应 的人员。如果他们还没有红帽登录，他们可以通过以下链接来 创建一个新的红帽登录。
如果您已经有了一个登录并和以上的帐号相连，您 将不需要这一步。您可以通过登录到以下网址来获得 与一个存在的红帽登录相连的帐号：
http://www.redhat.com/support/
如果您有一个红帽登录，而它并没有和这个邮件中列出的 帐号相连，而您又希望使用这个帐号来管理这些 订阅，红帽可以把它们转移到您希望的帐号中。请 联系红帽客户服务人员。您可以在以下的 链接中获得相应的联系信息：
{3}
帐号管理员（机构管理员）请注意：在一个新用户 可以访问订阅前，您必须为他们配置适当的权利来使他们 可以查看和管理您帐号中的订阅。这将需要您的帐号中有 一个用户管理权利。如果您需要它，请联系红帽 客户服务 人员。
非常感谢您选择红帽。
红帽帐号管理团队

trans-unit.source: Your Red Hat system is not able to receive service
trans-unit.target: 您的红帽系统不能接收服务

trans-unit.source:
Dear Red Hat Customer,
The following system has been associated with your Red Hat login and account in the past day, but could not be entitled to @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ services.
{0}
There are several reasons why this may have occurred:
1) You recently reinstalled a system and are attempting to associate the system with an existing, active subscription. Please ensure you delete your existing system profile on @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ by following the directions at https://rhn.redhat.com/help/faq/#26
2) The number of systems you have connected to @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ exceeds the number of active Red Hat subscriptions associated with your account. This may be because your subscriptions have expired or you need to purchase a Red Hat subscription.
To check the expiration dates of your existing Red Hat subscriptions, please visit:
https://www.redhat.com/apps/support/
Log in and click on View and manage your subscriptions link.
3) You recently installed a Red Hat product and your subscription number was not successfully activated. If you would like to try and activate your subscription again, please visit:
https://www.redhat.com/activate
For additional questions, please contact a Red Hat Customer Service representative at:
http://www.redhat.com/about/contact/directory.html#custservice
Thank you for using @@PRODUCT_NAME@@.
trans-unit.target:
尊敬的红帽用户，
以下的系统已经与您的 红帽登录和帐号相连。但它们还没有权利获得 红帽网络服务。
{0}
可能是以下的一个原因造成了这个问题：
1) 您当前重新安装了一个系统并试图把它与 一个存在的、已激活的订阅相连。请确定 您已经根据 https://rhn.redhat.com/help/faq/#26 中 介绍的方法删除了您已经存在的系统配置档案
2) 您连接到红帽网络的系统数量已经超过了 与您的帐号相关的激活的红帽订阅数量。 这可能是由于您的订阅已过期，或 您需要购买一个红帽订阅。
要检查您的红帽订阅的过期时间， 请访问：
https://www.redhat.com/apps/support/
登录后点“查看”来管理您的订阅链接。
3) 您当前安装了一个红帽产品，但您的红帽 订阅号没有被成功激活。如果您希望重新 尝试激活您的订阅，请访问：
https://www.redhat.com/activate
关于激活订阅或获得订阅号的信息， 请访问：
http://www.redhat.com/software/rhel/register/
如果您有其它任何问题，请联系红帽的 客户服务人员：
http://www.redhat.com/about/contact/directory.html#custservice
衷心感谢您使用红帽网络。

trans-unit.source: --------------------- Affected Systems List --------------------- This Errata Advisory may apply to the systems listed below. If you know that this errata does not apply to a system listed, it might be possible that the package profile for that server is out of date. In that case you should run 'up2date -p' (RHEL 4 and below) or 'rhn-profile-sync' (RHEL 5 and above) as root on the system in question to refresh your software profile.
trans-unit.target: --------------------- 受影响的系统列表 --------------------- 本勘误顾问可能适用于以下列出的系统。如果您知道 本勘误不适用于列出的系统，这可能是因为 该服务器的软件包侧写已经过期。在这种情况下您应该在受到质疑的系统中以根用户身份运行 'up2date -p'（RHEL 4 或者之前的版本）或者'rhn-profile-sync'（RHEL 5 或者更新的版本）来刷新您的软件侧写。

trans-unit.source: There is 1 affected system registered in 'Overview' (only systems for which you have explicitly enabled Errata Alerts are shown).
trans-unit.target: 有 1 个在“您的 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@”里注册的系统受到影响（仅显示 您已经显性地启用勘误警告的系统）。

trans-unit.source: There are {0} affected systems registered in 'Overview' (only systems for which you have explicitly enabled Errata Alerts are shown).
trans-unit.target: 有 {0} 个在“您的 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@”里注册的系统受到影响（仅显示 您已经显性地启用勘误警告的系统）。

trans-unit.source: @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Daily Status Report for {0}
trans-unit.target: @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 每日状态报告：{0}

trans-unit.source:
Dear @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ User,
This email is sent to validate the email address that you have provided for your Red Hat login. Your Red Hat login, in combination with an active Red Hat subscription, provides you with access to systems management capabilities through @@PRODUCT_NAME@@.
To ensure the security of the account information associated with your Red Hat login, please take a moment to click through the link below and verify that we have the correct email address. If you do not confirm your email address, your Red Hat login will eventually be deactivated.
Please note that this is a final notice. If you do not click through this URL within the next 2 days, your Red Hat login will deactivated.
To confirm your email address, please visit the following URL:
{0}
Thank you for using @@PRODUCT_NAME@@. {1} {2}
Red Hat Login Email Verification, Final Notice
trans-unit.target: 红帽登录电子邮件验证，最后一次通知

trans-unit.source: Red Hat @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Server Certificate expiration warning
trans-unit.target: 红帽 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 服务器证书过期警告

trans-unit.source:
Dear @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ User,
This email is being sent to you to inform you that your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Certificate has expired on your local satellite {0}. After {1} day(s) the systems management services provided by your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Server will become inaccessible. Please contact your regional Red Hat Customer Service Representative for information on how to renew your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Certificate.
Thank you for using @@PRODUCT_NAME@@. --the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Team
trans-unit.target:
尊敬的红帽网络用户，
这是一封通知邮件，您的 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 证书 已经在您本地的 satellite {0} 上过期。在 {1} 天后，由您的 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 服务器所提供的系统管理服务将无法使用。 请联系红帽的客户服务部门来获得如果更新 您的 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 证书的信息。
非常感谢您使用红帽网络。 --红帽网络管理团队

trans-unit.source: Red Hat satellite certificate expiration notice
trans-unit.target: 红帽 satellite 证书过期通知

trans-unit.source:
Dear @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ User,
This email is being sent to you to inform you that your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Certificate has expired on your local satellite {0}. The system management services will be inaccessible until your certificate is renewed. Please contact your regional Red Hat Customer Service Representative for information on how to renew your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Certificate.
Thank you for using @@PRODUCT_NAME@@. --the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Team
trans-unit.target:
尊敬的红帽网络用户，
这是一封通知邮件，您的 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 证书 已经在您本地的 satellite {0} 上过期。在您更新您的 证书前系统管理服务将无法使用。 请联系红帽的客户服务部门来获得如果更新 您的 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 证书的信息。
非常感谢您使用红帽网络。 --红帽网络管理团队
